summary: Various standalone eye textures for all races. These are not, by any means, realistic looking, but have a rather fantasy-looking touch to them. Inspired by nightskies and natural phenomenons.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=5]Iridum - Handcrafted Skyrim Eyes
by Halendia
[/size][/center]

[size=3][b]Category[/b]: [/size]Textures > Eyes > Standalones/New eyes

[size=3][b]Description[/b]:
[/size]
Adds unique, fantasy inspired eye textures into the game. Iridum Eyes does not replace standard textures as of now, and therefore, the textures are only usable by player character.

The structure of the mod is as follows: There are [b]names [/b]and [b]colours[/b], ([b]categories [/b]and [b]tags[/b]), all eyes come in categories, the category is given based on the base texture of the eye. Then there are colours. Colours are what makes every texture unique, and while there may be several eyes with the same texture, the colour+texture combination is never identical. Eyes and their colour+texture combination are available to view at the bottom of this page.

Why? Because I can.

[size=3][b]Compatibility:
[/b][/size]
Anything. This is a pure standalone mod.

[size=3][b]Installation:
[/b][/size]
Via NMM, just activate. Else extract into data folder.
[center]
[url=http://i.imgur.com/fPv80eE.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/V8HFsKU.jpg[/img][/url]Â [url=http://i.imgur.com/GmCO6dB.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/ytNDPXU.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
author: Halendia

files.name: Iridum Eyes Vampire Eyes Patch - Slitted and Round
files.changelogHtml:
Uploaded additional textures and enabled X-race usage
Introduced X-race, "CrossRace" eyes, that allows humans to have elven eye TEXTURES and so on...
X-race only supports Elves and Humans so far
Added a Vampire patch, enjoy :)

files.name: Iridum Eyes Standalone Pack
files.changelogHtml:
Added 11 brand new human textures.
Added a requested Retexture pack.
Added a new Standalone pack that contains the new human textures on the side.
Removed the X-Race function as of now, it will be reintroduced as a patch, next thing I do.

files.name: Iridum Eyes Retexture Pack
files.changelogHtml:
Added 11 brand new human textures.
Added a requested Retexture pack.
Added a new Standalone pack that contains the new human textures on the side.
Removed the X-Race function as of now, it will be reintroduced as a patch, next thing I do.

files.name: Iridum Eyes X-Race Patch
files.changelogHtml: Added X-Race Patch! This allows all elven eyes to be used on all elves + humans and all human eyes work on all elves

files.name: Iridum Eyes 2.0
files.changelogHtml: Revamped the entire mod and its structure. Everything remade.
